resources.string: "Enter english word or add from suggested"
"Congratulations!!! \nYou have learned that word in English"
"Congratulations!!! \n"You have learned this word in Russian"
"Remove all user data and restore default state?"

"	Welcome to Learning Word Program!

	At first you need to add words to your list, use Plus button to do so. After that you can answer by clicking on middle of the screen.

	I wanted this program to be simple and fast to use so I didn't add any check and you should have self control to have profit from it.

	After 3 right answers on both languages word will be moved to learnt. You can manage your words on list page.

	Best results can be achieved by checking all words on both languages one time every day.

	Good Luck!

"

"	Here you can check your words, delete some of them or delete everything by Purging Database.

	 Be careful to Purge, it will remove all progress.

"

"	Here you can add new words to your list.

	You can add words manually by typing word and translation for it or get translation through internet.

	Also you can use suggested words below.

"
